title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
HUGE breaking news with Joy Taylor filling in for Colin with Fox Sports making the announcement that 7-time Super Bowl Champion Tom Brady will be their lead analyst once he decides to retire from the NFL. She explains why the playoffs thus far have proven the NBA is in the best place it has been in years. She also discusses the Lakers plan to improve after missing the playoffs and what their biggest issue is right now. Plus, Fox Sports NBA insider Ric Bucher joins the show to talk about the new rivalries developing in this year's playoffs. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
